scripts.start: bun run start:migrate && bun run start:app
scripts.release:patch: bun run bump -- patch && bun run docker-build-push
scripts.release:minor: bun run bump -- minor && bun run docker-build-push
scripts.release:major: bun run bump -- major && bun run docker-build-push
scripts.docker:build: bun run get-version | xargs -I {} docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t registry.erkenningen.nl/examenservices-fetcher:{} --progress=plain .
scripts.docker:push: bun run get-version | xargs -I {} docker push registry.erkenningen.nl/examenservices-fetcher:{}
scripts.docker-build-push: bun run docker:build && bun run docker:push && bun run git:push
